Scenario.name: Scenario Uncertainty
Scenario.description: Distinct scenarios depending on the uncertain outcome, no statistical means
Scenario.exampleText: Handling different types of input data in a software system.

Recognized.name: Recognized Ignorance
Recognized.description: Awareness of the uncertainty but no mitigation or description strategy is in place.
Recognized.exampleText: The trustworthiness of partner companies that are included in the software engineering process.
